column2: Exxon Mobil Corporation explores for and produces crude oil and natural gas in the United States and internationally. It operates through Upstream
column4: and Chemical segments. The company is also involved in the manufacture
column11: and other specialty products; and manufactures and sells petrochemicals
column15: and various other petrochemicals. As of December 31
